name: social-media-automation
description: Social media automation platform with RSS crawling, AI post generation, and multi-platform publishing

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:full: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd .. && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
